oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Anthony Medley interview
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Ed Caudill
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Vietnam War, 1961-1975
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Lt. Anthony Medley served with the 3rd Battalion, 7th Marines, 1st Marine Division in Vietnam from March 1969 to January 1970. He retired as a lieutenant colonel in 1994. This interview was conducted Sept. 1, 2020, by Billy Minser and Ed Caudill.
